title: FOX BMX | BREAKING BOUNDARIES | SOUTH AMERICA
description:
Traveling internationally is always an adventure and you’re never really sure what to expect when you get there, so getting the opportunity to visit Peru and Guatemala was a surreal and humbling experience for all of us. From the food to the riding spots and amazing people we met, it was hard to say goodbye. 
EDIT: Veesh

CAMERA: Veesh, Devon Hutchins

MUSIC: Red Snapper "Card Trick" and "Wonky Bikes" Eros and the Eschaton "Over and Over" and "Don't look so Sad"
